age_at_offence.source: he was 21 years old at the time

age_at_sentencing.source: The defendant is now 23 years old

gender.source: He was committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence.

household_composition.source: Defendant lived there with his parents and younger brother.

occupation.source: After finishing school, he became an elevator repair apprentice

monthly_wage.source: make some deliveries for $16,000 a month

family_supports.source: I do have a mitigation letter from the defendant’s parents who are very supportive and accept the defendant’s remorse as genuine.
